entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers near the Cariboo mountains. Risk of thunderstorms in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 16. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low zero.
